subject: PAYMENT US$24.5 MILLION FOR YO
body:
PAYMENT US$24.5 MILLION FOR YOU,URGENT RESPONSE THIS EMAIL....
Attention
WHAT IS YOUR PROBLEM NOW,LISTEN TO ME MY DEAR,WE RECEIVED EMAIL TODAY
AFTER MY EMAIL TO YOU THIS TODAY WE RECEIVE EMAIL FROM THIS MAN CALL
MRS.CONNIE CONTROLLING THAT YOU HAVE MOTOR ACCIDENT TODAY MORNING AND
YOU DEAD? IS TRUE THAT YOU ARE DEAD PLEASE URGENT RESPONSE IF YOU ARE
ALIVE AS THIS EMAIL FORWARDED TO OUR KEYSTONE BANK CUSTODY OFFICE
TODAY FROM MRS.CONNIE CONTROLLING IMPOSTOR,WHO CAME TO OUR KEYSTONE
BANK OFFICE THIS MORNING WITH HIS BARRISTER,AND STATED THAT YOU ARE
DEAD WITH MOTOR ACCIDENT THAT YOU ARE KNOW MORE IN THIS WORLD AGAIN
SHE WANTED TO CLAIM THIS FUND OUT OF YOUR NAME AS YOUR NEXT OF KING
SHE IS READY TO PAY ALL THE DELIVERY FEE NEEDED TO CLAIM UP YOUR FUND
AS YOU DEAD LISTEN IF YOU ARE NOT DEAD THAT YOU ARE ALIVE URGENT
RESPONSE THIS EMAIL WITH UPDATE THE DELIVERY FEE TO SHOW US THE TRUE
THAT YOU STILL ALIVE,BEFORE WE CANCEL OUT YOUR NAME OFF IN THIS TOTAL
FUND OF $24.500,000 00 USD,FROM KEYSTONE BANK
,IF YOU ARE NOT DEAD THAT
YOU ARE ALIVE URGENT RESPONSE THIS EMAIL UPDATE US WITH NEEDED $50
APPLE GIFT CARD OR STEAM WALLET IF YOU ARE ALIVE TO SHOW US THE TRUE
THAT YOU ARE ALIVE TO RECEIVE YOUR FUNDS,OR MRS.CONNIE CONTROLLING
IMPOSTOR WILL CLAIM UP YOUR FUNDS FINAL
MR JAMES WILLIAMS

subject: Re: PAYMENT US$24.5 MILLION FOR YO
body:
Hello Mr. James Williams,

Wow, that's quite a shocking news to hear about myself! I can assure you that I am very much alive and well. I'm sorry for any confusion this may have caused.

I'm curious though, how did this person claiming to be my next of kin find out about the fund? And why would they think I had an accident? It's all very strange.

Also, could you please explain more about the Apple Gift Card or Steam Wallet you mentioned? How does it relate to proving that I'm alive?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Kenton
